content: Oil and gas producer WPX Energy Inc  said on Tuesday it has agreed to sell natural gas assets in Colorado's Piceance Basin for $910 million to a private firm  in a deal viewed by investors as a bright spot in the sluggish market for oil and gas properties.
name: WPX Energy Inc
title: WPX Energy to sell Colorado assets for $910 million; shares rise

content: Feb 9 Oil and gas producer WPX Energy Inc  said on Tuesday it has agreed to sell natural gas assets in Colorado's Piceance Basin for $910 million to a private firm  in a deal viewed by investors as a bright spot in the sluggish market for oil and gas properties.
name: WPX Energy Inc
title: UPDATE 2-WPX Energy to sell Colorado assets for $910 mln; shares rise

content: Feb 9 Oil and gas producer WPX Energy Inc  said it would sell natural gas assets in Colorado's Piceance basin for $910 million to boost liquidity amid a prolonged slump in oil prices.
name: WPX Energy Inc
title: REFILE-WPX Energy to sell Colorado assets for $910 mln

content: WILLISTON  N.D. Drilling rigs are coming back to North Dakota. WPX Energy Inc  a small oil producer in the No. 2 U.S. crude state  said on Thursday it will add two rigs this year  becoming the first since the crude price downturn to announce concrete steps to boost output.
name: WPX Energy Inc
title: In bet on oil prices  WPX plans to add Bakken rigs

content: WILLISTON  N.D.  June 25 Drilling rigs are coming back to North Dakota. WPX Energy Inc  a small oil producer in the No. 2 U.S. crude state  said on Thursday it will add two rigs this year  becoming the first since the crude price downturn to announce concrete steps to boost output.
name: WPX Energy Inc
title: In bet on oil prices  WPX plans to add Bakken rigs

content: WASHINGTON Fracking for shale oil and gas has not led to widespread pollution of drinking water  a U.S. Environmental Protection Agency draft report said on Thursday  although it warned some drilling activities could potentially cause health risks.
name: WPX Energy Inc
title: Fracking not a 'widespread risk' to drinking water: U.S. EPA

content: WILLISTON  N.D. Oil and gas producer WPX Energy Inc would add one or two drilling rigs in North Dakota if WTI oil prices stabilized around $65 per barrel  Chief Executive Rick Muncrief told Reuters on Friday.
name: WPX Energy Inc
title: Exclusive: WPX Energy would add North Dakota rigs with $65 per barrel oil

content: WILLISTON  N.D.  May 15 Oil and gas producer WPX Energy Inc would add one or two drilling rigs in North Dakota if oil prices stabilized around $65 per barrel  Chief Executive Rick Muncrief told Reuters on Friday.
name: WPX Energy Inc
title: WPX Energy would add North Dakota rigs with $65/barrel oil

content: NEW YORK U.S. crude stocks rose nearly twice as much as expected last week as refineries cut output from a seasonal record high  while gasoline stocks unexpectedly fell and distillate inventories rose  data showed on Wednesday.
name: WPX Energy Inc
title: U.S. crude oil inventories rise as refiners pare record runs: EIA
